document_data.name: Jubal
document_data.mainbody: Doctor '''Jubal''' was a businessman in the [[Moonsea]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/No Foolish Matter|12}}
document_data.Activities: Doctor Jubal managed the wandering [[Doctor Jubal's Carnival of Curiosities]].{{Cite adventurers league/No Foolish Matter|11}}
document_data.History: Doctor Jubal had managed his carnival for almost ten years. At one point, he bought a strange mirror maze in [[Waterdeep]].''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], he hired the [[doppelganger]] [[Tak]], promising to help her against the [[Great Law of Humanity]] in [[Hillsfar]]. However, he did not truly care about it and when Tak discovered this, she subdued Jubal and took his position.{{Cite adventurers league/No Foolish Matter|14}}
document_data.Rumors: Some said that Jubal was a wizard from [[Hillsfar]] who had lost his magic or else a member of the [[Red Plumes]].
